author: rvesse
msg: Add Javadoc link to Elephas documentation

author: julianfoad
msg: On the 'move-tracking-2' branch: Add the ability to store branching info in
a local file instead of in revprops.
The intent is to make it possible, later, to run 'svnmover' against an
existing repository without modifying it.
For now, just to exercise the options, we choose to store the data in local
files for RA-local and revprops for a remote repo.
* subversion/include/private/svn_ra_private.h
(svn_ra_get_commit_editor_ev3): Add a branch info directory parameter.
* subversion/libsvn_ra/ra_loader.c
(read_rev_prop,
write_rev_prop): New functions, factored out and extended to support
the option of storing in local files instead.
(svn_branch_revision_fetch_info,
svn_branch_repos_fetch_info,
svn_branch_get_mutable_state,
store_repos_info,
ccw_baton,
commit_callback_wrapper,
remap_commit_callback,
svn_ra_get_commit_editor_ev3): Pass along the new parameter.
* subversion/svnmover/svnmover.c
(mtcc_create): Choose whether to store branching info in local files or in
revprops, and pass this along to svn_ra_get_commit_editor_ev3.
